sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Cover from '../../img/cover.jpg' import Profile from '../../img/profileImg.jpg' import './ProfileCard.css' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const ProfileCard = (location) => { // Profile card is the left side division the whole thing // ProfilePage=false renders the /homeversion of profile card: it doesn't tell us the number of posts // Profile Page=true renders the individual user page. It tells us the number of posts. const ProfilePage= false; const {user}=useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) const serverPublic=process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER return (
{user.firstname} {user.lastname} {/* the text right below your name */} {user.worksAt? user.worksAt: "Write about yourself"}
{user.following.length} Following
{user.followers.length} Followers
{ProfilePage && ( <>
3 Posts
)}
{location === 'profilePage'?'': My Profile }
) } export default ProfileCard
